    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update​(float deltaTime)
        Should be called once per frame.
        Overrides:
        update in class danogl.GameObject
        Parameters:
        deltaTime - The time elapsed, in seconds, since the last frame. Can be used to determine a new position/velocity by multiplying this delta with the velocity/acceleration respectively and adding to the position/velocity: velocity += deltaTime*acceleration pos += deltaTime*velocity
